text: Kare-ra wa, arra ga tsukura reta kokumotsu to kachiku no ichibubun o kattena kuso ni yotte (sonaete),`koreha arra ni, soshite kore wa watashi-tachi no kamigami ni.' To iu. Daga kamigami ni sonaeta mono wa arra ni wa tasshinai. Soshite arra ni sonaeta mono ga, kare-ra no kamigami ni tassuru. Kare-ra no handan koso wazawaidearu
